Package edu.monash.fit2099.engine

Interface Capable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Actor, Bomb, Bug, Capabilities, Corpse, Crater, Crop, Dirt, Farmer, Fence, Floor, Floor, Food, Ground, Human, Item, LockedDoor, MamboMarie, MartianItem, Plank, Player, Player, Player, PortableItem, RangedWeapon, Shotgun, SimpleClub, SniperRifle, Stick, Tree, Tree, Vehicle, Wall, WeaponItem, Zombie, ZombieActor, ZombieClub, ZombieMace
    public interface Capable
    An interface for representing a collection of any kind of enum. A practical alternative to type introspection and other problems.
